https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/29vKnspknYKu3S9PCf269aR61ZV.jpg Edith and Eddie, ages 96 and 95, are America's oldest interracial newlyweds. Their unusual and idyllic love story is threatened by a family feud that triggers a devastating abuse of the legal guardianship system. Edith+Eddie
